title: Commercial property market value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2012 to 2016
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market value in billion GBP. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Market value in billion GBP has increased over the Year.
Market value in billion GBP is roughly constant from 2012 to 2013, gradually increasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Market value in billion GBP, about 926.0 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Market value in billion GBP about 650.0 was reached at Year 2012
